feed.title: WCU-AIR
feed.subtitle: The Artificial Intelligence Research (AIR) Lab at West Chester University is a collaborative community of faculty and students exploring how AI can make a positive impact. We bring together diverse computer science, engineering, and education perspectives, with a strong emphasis on mentorship and hands-on experience. Our members contribute to publications, open-source projects, and applied collaborations while developing skills that prepare them for both academic and industry careers. By fostering inclusion and curiosity, the AIR Lab provides an environment where innovation and learning thrive side by side.
